tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE suppliers (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), compliance_status BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE contracts (contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_id INT, contract_amount DECIMAL(10,2), contract_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (requirement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, requirement_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT)
CREATE TABLE supplier_compliance (compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_id INT, requirement_id INT, compliance_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE Products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(50),
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id),
    product_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceData (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id),
    compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    compliance_expiry_date DATE
);
